data.name: Shiseido Urea Skin Care Cream 100g
data.short_description:
Shiseido Urea Cream is a Japanese skincare cream containing 10% of urea, squalane, and hyaluronic acid to moisturize dry and rough skin, keeping it soft, smooth, and supple.

Urea, also known as carbamide, is a natural substance compound found in the surface layer of our skin that maintains skin moisture balance and the suppleness of the skin.
 

The levels of urea in our skin are reduced when the skin is dry or in certain skin conditions such as dermatitis or eczema. This causes rough, irritated, scaly, or flaky skin.
 

Urea-based skincare products hold water on molecules enabling skin cells to absorb and retain additional moisture.
data.description:
​​​​​​​
 

FEATURES:


 

  • This cream blended with 10% of urea penetrates quickly and deeply into the skin, making even the hardest skin from fingertips, heels, and knees, more flexible and soft.
  • Urea is non-toxic, non-allergenic, anti-itch, anti-microbial, colorless, and odorless.
  • Shiseido Urea cream spreads well when applied, with no sticky feeling.

Ingredients:

(In 1 gram cream) urea 100mg/ tocopherol acetate 1mg/

dipotassium glycyrrhizinate0.5mg Additives: liquid paraffin, squalane, petroleum jelly, silicon oil, cetanol, stearyl alcohol, glycerin, 1,3-butylene glycol, stearic acid, behene Contains acid, glycerin trioctanoate, polyoxyethylene hydrogenated castor oil, polyoxyl stearate, glycerin stearate, sodium hydroxide, sodium citrate, sodium edetate, paraben, sodium hyaluronate, and one other ingredients
data.guide:
DIRECTIONS OF USE: 

After cleansing face, take an appropriate amount and apply all over the face.

Use both morning and night.

data.name: Kikumasamune Sake Skin Care Emulsion 380ml
data.short_description: This milky emulsion is formulated with dry sake made by famed Japanese brewer Kiku-Masamune. Naturally rich in kojic acid that refines, hydrates, soothes and brightens skin, the emulsion also contains arbutin, amino acids and placenta extract to protect against moisture loss.
data.description:
Kikumasamune Skin Care Emulsion contains Japanese sake, ceramide and placenta extract to moisturize and tone your skin. 

The sake used to create this Japanese emulsion is high quality Junmai Ginjo sake from Kikumasamune brewery. Sake is packed with many amino acids which are good for the skin. 

Arbutin is also added to the formula for?brightening the skin. 
 

Features


 

  • Suitable for dry and rough skin.
  • Irritation-free formula.
  • Large size and easy-to-use pump bottle?to use it both on face and body.
  • The non-sticky texture is smooth and dry.
  • Low pH. Colorant-free.
data.guide:
How to use:

After cleansing, take a few drops into the palm of your hands.
 

Gently press the lotion into the skin and let it fully absorbed.

data.short_description:
Watery moisturising gel Containing 4 moisturizing ingredients “Super Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid Na, Amino Acid, Collagen”.

The gel delivers extremely concentrated moisture to prevent dryness and skin dehydration.

The aqua gel protects the skin with the best UV-cut effect. Unique ingredients that prevent the UV-cut function from being ineffective by light.

Category: Cosmetics/Skin care 




  • Brand Name: Skin aqua
  • Company: Rohto
  • Origin of the Country: Japan
  • Weight: 110 gm

Features and Benefits: 




  • SPF 35+ Watery Sunscreen with a PA++++ UVA/UVB Radiation protection rating.
  • Keeps your skin soft and moisturized while blocking harmful UV rays.?This is a sunscreen for face and body.
  • Waterproof for up to 80 minutes. Reapply frequently for proper effectiveness

data.name: Kose Cosmeport Moisture Mild Whitening Perfect Essence (lotion) 230ml
data.short_description: Packed with Vitamin C derivatives, royal jelly extracts, collagen and hyaluronic acid, this essence work its magic by brightening complexions while leaving skin feeling fresher.
data.description:
After a sunburn, wait until the redness and tingling of the skin have subsided before using. 
Because it contains vitamin C, the contents may become yellowish, but there is no problem with the quality. 
The whitening active ingredient may crystallize and adhere to the mouth of the pump, but there is no problem with the quality. 
Do not place it in a hot place or in a sunny place. 
 




 

Ingredients:


Niacinamide * , purified water, 1,3-butylene glycol, concentrated glycerin, L-ascorbic acid 2-glucoside, sodium hyaluronate (2), L-ascorbyl magnesium phosphate, royal jelly extract, water-soluble collagen solution (A), Acrylic acid/alkyl methacrylate copolymer, sodium acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl taurate copolymer/isohexadecane , polysorbate 80, disodium edetate, carboxyvinyl polymer, squalane, pentaerythritol tetra-2-ethylhexanoate, Polyoxyethylene methyl glucoside, methylpolysiloxane, sodium monohydrogen phosphate, sodium dihydrogen phosphate, sodium hydroxide, hydrogenated soybean phospholipids, phenoxyethanol, methylparaben
data.guide:
How to Use :

After washing your face, take an appropriate amount (1 to 2 pushes) on cotton or palm and apply it to your skin.

Precautions:

  • Do not leave it in a hot place or in a sunny place.



  • Please tighten the cap properly after use. Carefully check that you have no abnormalities on your skin before using.



  • Do not use if you have an abnormality on your skin such as scratches, swelling or eczema.
  • Should you observe any abnormalities such as redness, swelling, itchiness, irritation, color loss (white spots etc.) and skin darkening during use, discontinue use and consult a dermatologist. Symptoms may worsen if you continue to use it.

data.name: Shiseido Baby Powder Medicated Pressed Powder 50g
data.description:
Shiseido Baby Powder is a handy and functional Japanese pressed powder that smoothens and brightens the skin by controlling skin oil excretion as well as covering pores. 

This compact baby powder prevents pimples, acne, breakouts and absorbs excess any oil excretion from the skin. It also helps protect the skin from prickly heat, inflammation, diaper rash, and thigh chafing while keeping it in healthy skin condition. 
 

Features


 

  • Less spattering due to its compact powder form.
  • Formulated with very mild ingredients for all types of skin. Specially made for people who has sensitive skin and who are allergic from regular baby powder.
  • No fragrance and coloring.
  • Matte and translucent finish after applying.


 

Instructions


Apply by gently pressing the attached puff into the skin. 

Suitable to use on adults or baby's delicate skin; after bathing, when changing diaper, or after cleansing the skin with baby lotion to remove sweat, etc.

1. Gently wash away dirt and oil from the scalp with lukewarm water.
2. Dispense shampoo on the palm and use your fingertips to massage the scalp in a small circular motion from above the ears.
3. Cover your entire scalp with the foaming lather and leave it on for a few minutes. The rich, bouncy foam absorbs dirt and oil from the scalp for a soothing and refreshing cleanse.

data.name: Roho HadaLabo Shirojyun Whitening Lotion Rich 170ml
data.short_description:
Infused with arbutin (an active brightening ingredient) and various types of hyaluronic acid (a moisturizing ingredient), this lotion restores skin’s moisture and evens skin texture for its smooth and luminescent appearance.

Effectively suppresses melanin production to prevent freckle and sun spot formation to treat sun-damaged skin.

Also contains a Vitamin C derivative, Vitamin E, and coix seed extract to further nourish and brighten skin.

The slightly acidic formula is gentle on the skin.

Made free of fragrance, artificial colorant, mineral oil, and alcohol.
data.description:
Hada-Labo Shirojyun Whitening Lotion Rich is a Japanese watery lotion that targets 
dark spots. 
The moisture-replenishing toner has a rich texture that is ideal for normal to dry skin. It is renewed to 
feature anti-inflammatory tranexamic acid to prevent discoloration while better preventing rough skin 
than the previous formula. Vitamin C derivative, vitamin E, Job's Tears extract, and newly added 
fermented Job's Tears nourish and boost skin's clarity. 2 types of hyaluronic acid deeply hydrate skin. 
It penetrates deeply to replenish moisture while helping to improve skin's clarity for refined, smoother skin 
that is bright and supple. 
 

Ingredients:


Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, hyaluronic acid Na-2, Tranexamic acid, vitamin C phosphate Mg, vitamin E, pearl barley fermentation liquid, coix seed extract, BG, DPG, concentrated glycerin, diglycerin, pentylene glycol, sorbitol liquid, edetate, VP Styrene copolymer emulsion, POE (20) , sorbitan laurate, carboxyvinyl polymer, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
How to use:

After cleansing, take a few drops into the palm of your hands.
 

Gently press the lotion into the skin and let it fully absorbed.

data.name: SUNCUT Perfect UV Gel (SPF50+ PA++++) 100 ml
data.short_description:
Super Waterproof- outstanding sweat, water, sebum and friction resistance.

Maximum UV protection factor* blocks harsh UV rays over an extended period.

A lightweight gel that you can splash over your skin like toner for immediate absorption.

Although light it’s also highly concentrated, providing lasting UV protection.
data.description:
SUNCUT Perfect UV Gel is a Japanese sunscreen gel. 
The sunscreen gel gives the skin long-lasting UV protection while having the refreshing, water-light texture and invisible finish of a watery lotion. It features Suncut's new "Stretch Fit" formula that creates a skin-bond veil that stretches to skin's every movement to better protect the skin against the blazing sun even when exposed to water, perspiration, sebum, or normal friction. Suncut's signature "Al le rGua rd" prevents pollen, dust and other airborne environmental stressors from clinging to the skin. A skincare blend of squalane and 10 moisturising botanical extracts protects the skin against dryness.

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujyun Perfect Gel (Moisturiser) , 100g
data.short_description:
Hada Labo Koi Gokujyun Perfect Gel provides hydration deep into the stratum corneum and locks in moisture.

  • All-in-one gel with 5 functions: Lotion, Milk, Cream, Serum, and Mask.
  • Formulated with powerful moisturizing ingredients (4 types of Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide, Squalane, and Sacran) to provide your skin with the ultimate intense hydration.
  • pH balanced, low irritation.
  • Free of fragrances, mineral oil, alcohol, and colorant.
data.description:
Hada Labo Koi-Gokujyun Perfect Gel is a moisturizing gel works as a toner, essence, serum, moisturizer, and mask all in one. Perfect for those lazy nights or when you're pressed for time in the morning. 

Enriched with 4 kinds of hyaluronic acid at various molecular weights to deeply hydrate the skin and to improve the skin's moisture-retention abilities, glycerin, urea, and squalane to intensely moisturize the skin, while the ceramides work to strengthen the skin barriers and collagen to restore firmness and elasticity the skin. 

This formula helps to firm the skin and instantly hydrates it and provides it with long-lasting moisture and smoothness.  

INGREDIENTS:


Water, BG, glycerin, hydroxyethyl urea, pentylene glycol, PPG-10 methyl glucose, triethylhexanoin, squalane, (acryloyldimethyltaurate ammonium/VP) copolymer, behenyl alcohol, sodium acetylated hyaluronate (super hyaluronic acid), hyaluronic acid Na, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid (nanized hyaluronic acid), hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate (skin adsorbing hyaluronic acid), hydrolyzed collagen, glucosylceramide (ceramide), Suizenjinori polysaccharide (cherry), dimethicone, PPG-17 butes -17, triethyl citrate, cyclopentasiloxane, phenoxyethanol, disodium succinate, dimethicone crosspolymer, agar, EDTA-2Na, succinate, a-glucan, acrylates copolymer ammonium, methylparaben
data.guide:

After cleansing with ?Face Wash, take a quarter-size amount of gel into the palm and gently massage onto the face until thoroughly absorbed.

data.name: Kose Cosmeport Suncut Tone Up UV Essence SPF50+ PA++++ 80g
data.short_description:
Kosé Suncut Tone Up UV Essence is a Japanese sunscreen that controls your skin color and minimizes dullness.

Concretely this innovative sunscreen has lavender pigments to counteract dullness and color-correct your skin while protecting from UV.





The lavender color will make your skin instantly gorgeous without makeup,

while it will leave your skin look translucent for your next social media snap.

Suncut Tone Up UV Essence has a watery, lightweight texture that absorbs fast and does not leave residues.
data.description:
Kose Suncut Tone Up UV Essence is a Japanese sunscreen that controls your skin color and minimizes dullness. 




  • A lavender color that instantly makes your skin look beautiful.
  • The lavender color will make your skin instantly gorgeous without makeup, while it will leave your skin look translucent.
  • In addition to the lavender color that suppresses dullness of the skin, a fine pink pearl that attracts fair skin with the effect of light is added.
  • Finishes with fair skin with outstanding transparency.
  • Contains transparency-enhancing ingredients and skin color control ingredients.
  • A color-fitting prescription that keeps you fresh and beautiful.
  • It adheres tightly to the skin and does not easily fade or transfer even when rubbed, so freshly applied clean skin lasts for a long time.
  • Contains luxurious skin care ingredients that make your skin moisturized and transparent.
  • Raspberry extract, lemon extract, hyaluronic acid (moisturizer), vitamin C derivatives (product antioxidants).
  • A crystal floral scent that is transparent and delicate.
  • Suncut Tone Up UV Essence has a watery, lightweight texture that absorbs fast and does not leave residues.

Features:

  • Highest rated UV protection, SPF50+ /PA+++
  • Skincare beauty components such as raspberry, lemon, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C are blended to prevent dryness.
  • Suited for both face and body.
  • Super waterproof yet can be washed off with a face wash or soap.
  • Can be used as a makeup base.

Uv filter-ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, zinc oxide, polysilicone-15, hexyl diethylaminohydroxybenzoylbenzoate, bisethylhexyloxyphenol methoxyphenyltriazine

data.name: ISEHAN - Kiss Me Sunkiller Perfect Water Essence SPF 50+ PA++++
data.short_description: Isehan Sunkiller Perfect Water Essence is a Japanese gel-type sunscreen formulated with 86% hydrating components and with the highest rated UV protection available: SPF50+ and PA++++ (PA value shows how well a sunscreen can block UVA).
data.description:
Isehan Sunkiller Perfect Water Essence is a Japanese gel-type sunscreen formulated with 86% hydrating components and with the highest rated UV protection available: SPF50+ and PA++++ (PA value shows how well a sunscreen can block UVA). 

The sunscreen contains three kinds of hyaluronic acid and three kinds of natural moisturizing components including royal jelly, aloe vera and saxifrage extract to keep your skin hydrated outside in the sun. 

This product has a lightweight texture that feels like water when applied and does not contain any unpleasant smells found on other sunscreens. Suitable for the face and body, it can also be used as a makeup base and is free of parabens, artificial coloring and alcohol. 

Our customers love the light feeling of this product on the skin, the ease of application, non-greasy texture, and light citrus fragrance. This sunscreen is suitable for all skin types and does not leave any white cast after application. 








Ingredients:





Uv Filter - Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate,, Methoxyphenyl triazine, titanium oxide,diethylaminohydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate





Other Ingredients- Water, pentylene glycol, Sodium acetyl hyaluronate, Hyaluronic acid Na, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic acid, Yukinoshita extract, Aloe vera leaf extract, Royal jelly extract, Isononyl isononanoate, (acrylic acid Na / acryloyldimethyltaurine Na) copolymer, isohexadecane, octenyl succinic acid Al, BG, ethylhexyl glycerin, polysorbate 80, dilauroyl glutamate lysine Na, aluminum hydroxide Al, stearic acid, xanthan gum, Sorbitan oleate, phenoxyethanol, perfume, (Acryloyldimethyltaurine ammonium / VP) copolymer, Tocoferro Le, BHT, t- butanol
data.guide:
Instructions:

Gently apply a generous amount of gel to protect your skin.



It is recommended to re-apply frequently for better protection.



You do not need a makeup remover to wash it off.

data.name: KAO Biore Aqua Rich Aqua Protect Lotion SPF 50+ PA++++ 70g
data.short_description:
The water-based sunscreen goes on like water and transorms into a water-rich, mask-like texture that adheres and conforms perfectly to the skin.

Biore's adhesive outer skin formula with encapsulated UV filters is dispersed in Aqua Nano Capsules, forming a thin and even UV-blocking film that adheres uniformly like a second layer of skin.

Hyaluronic acid, royal jelly, and glycerin keep the skin hydrated.

The water-like sunscreen protects against daily summer UV exposure with no chalky white residue.

Skin feels perfectly hydrated and smooth.

New GAP technology to bring ultimate watery texture.

Water-beads formation to enhance watery usage feeling.

For face & body usage.

Resistant to water and sweat (80 minutes).

Can be used as a makeup base.
data.description:
• Suppita spreads like water and sticks to your skin.
  • It changes to a pack feeling and protection starts.
  • Water layer pack UV.
  • Familiar quickly and does not appear white.
  • For transparent and glossy skin.
  • Moisturizes the skin and improves makeup.
  • Super waterproof (confirmed in 80 minutes water resistance test).
  • You can remove it with soap.
  • Contains moisturizing ingredients (hyaluronic acid, royal jelly extract, glycerin).

Ingredients

Uv filter- ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate,ethylhexyl triazone,diethylamino hydroxybenzoyl hexyl benzoate,bis-ethylhexyloxyphenol methoxyphenyl triazine

data.guide:
How to use:

It is a two-layer type, shake it well until you hear a click.



Then put it out in small amounts on your palm and apply it evenly to your skin.

After conditioning the skin with basic cosmetics on the face and neck, apply it carefully.

If the amount is too small, you will not get a sufficient sunscreen effect.

To maintain the effect, reapply frequently after wiping off sweat.

Be careful not to let the liquid come into direct contact with your clothes, and wait until it dries before putting on your clothes.

When removing, wash thoroughly with your usual cleanser (face wash, makeup remover, etc., body cleanser, etc.).

data.name: Nivea UV Deep Protect & Care Gel Sunscreen SPF50+ PA++++ 80g
data.short_description:
Super waterproof. Uses a 3D UV film that is resistant to sweat and water.

Essence ingredient (moisturizer) combination:

Gold and silver flower extract , pearl protein extract , damask rose flower water, BG.

Makes fine wrinkles due to drying inconspicuous.

Clear floral scent.

data.description:
This is a gel-type sunscreen which is designed to prevent spots and freckles without a greasy feeling. 

It features a powerful UV protection effect of SPF50+ and PA++++. 

This waterproof gel is compatible to any type of skin and can apply to both face and body. You can use it as a makeup base. 

It helps your skin hydrate even under sunlight and water because it contains beauty essence agents that effectively cover wrinkles. 

The gel has an aromatic floral scent. You can rinse it with normal body soap and facial wash.

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujyun Premium Hyaluranic Acid Milk Lotion 140 ml
data.short_description:
Hada-La bo Gokujyun Premium Hyaluronic Acid Lotion (also called “Hada-Labo Gokujyun Premium Hydrating Lotion’) is an ultra-hydrating Japanese milky lotion.


The extra-rich hydrating toner replenishes skin’s moisture like a serum and it is renewed to penetrate deeper and better hold onto moisture than the previous formula. This newly upgraded version features 7 types of hyaluronic acids including Hada-Labo’s smallest molecular size of hyaluronic acid yet. New anti-inflammatory fermented hyaluronic acid helps fortify the skin’s moisture barrier to keep skin looking plump and supple. Algae-derived Sacran helps skin retain moisture while protecting against drying external stimulus.


It envelopes dry to very dry skin in a veil of moisture to keep skin supple and healthy-looking through the day.
data.description:
The Hada Labo Gokujyun Premium Lotion is a hydrating essence that is amazing at smoothing and plumping the skin and improving the appearance of fine lines. It is a light, thick-water texture that sinks into the skin quickly and without heaviness or stickiness on the skin. 

The new 2020 version of this adds a Fermented version of Hyaluronic Acid combined with Lactobacillus which is supposed to help hold even more moisture in the skin and strengthen the skin. 

Formulated without alcohol, fragrance, mineral oil, sulfates, or other irritating ingredients. 
 



 

PRODUCT DETAILS:


 

  • Type: Milky Lotion
  • Format: Bottle /?Refill
  • Contents: 140ml
  • Made in: Japan
  • Brand: Hada Labo


 

INGREDIENTS:


Water, glycerin, DPG, mineral oil, dimethicone, cetanol, triethylhexanoin, olefin oligomer, sodium hyaluronate, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, sodium acetyl hyaluronate, hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate, sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, lactic acid bacteria/ Hyaluronic acid fermentation broth, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid Na, Suizenjinori polysaccharide, allantoin, BG, palmitic acid, arginine, pentylene glycol, carbomer, hydroxyethylcellulose, EDTA-2Na, cetyl phosphate, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
DIRECTIONS OF USE:

  • Apply on cleansed toned skin and after your serum.




  • Use either as a light moisturizing lotion or before a moisturizer in your skincare routine.
  • Take appropriate amount in the hands, evenly apply to face and neck, pat into the skin completely absorbed.
  • Can be used at night and in the morning.
  • Apply a high SPF Sunscreen as the last step of your morning skincare routine.
  • Use twice daily after washing face.

As well as “Kikumasamune Skin Lotion of Japanese Sake”, which has a reputation for being “moisturizing” with a light feeling. With a lot of contents, you can use it plentifully on your body such as neck, arms, and feet, in addition to your face. For skin care finishing, it is comfortable to have “cream” after all. Moisturizing firmly with “Japanese sake cream”!

Skin Cream formulated with “O-sake”, Japanese rice wine (rice fermented liquid · moisturizing ingredient) to give moisture and improve the skin condition.

Leading to moist and soft skin, by delivering moisture in combination with 4 types of amino acids and 3 types of ceramides (moisturizing ingredients).

Comfortable to use with no stickiness although there is richness, and protects the skin from drying.

– Large capacity that you can use plenty enough for both face and body.

– Sweet and soft scent of sake.

– Weakly acidic · colorless

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujyun Aging Care Lotion 170ml
data.short_description: Hada Labo Gokujyun Medicated Aging Care Lotion, specially formulated for aging care, firms and smoothens the look of your skin as you moisturize.
data.description:
Hada Labo Gokujyun Medicated Aging Care Lotion, specially formulated for aging care, firms and smoothens the look of your skin as you moisturize. 

This lotion along with other Gokujyun series keeps the skin hydrated and make it resilient as if it is lifted from deep inside. 

It can be used as a standalone moisturizer. Or, if you need more moisture, use with milky lotion and cream for better results. 
 

Features


 


 


 

  • Specializes in skin concerns common to aging generations including wrinkles, freckles and dull skin.
  • Niacinamide and 3 hyaluronic acids combat with the freckles and spots, deeply hydrate to the depth of your skin.
  • Continuous use of this product allows you to have more chances to obtain resilient and soft skin.
  • Mild acidity, same as the wholesome skin. No use of fragrance, colorant, mineral oil, alcohol, and paraben.


 



 

 ingredients:


Niacinamide, Hyaluronic acid Na-2, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, acetylated sodium hyaluronate, acetylglucosamine, Phellodendron bark extract, BG, concentrated glycerin, 1,2-pentanediol, PEG (30), a-olefin oligomer, polyoxyethylene polyoxy Propylene decyl tetradecyl ether, POE behenyl ether, meadowfoam oil, carboxyvinyl polymer, TEA, edetate, hydroxyethylcellulose, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
Instructions

After your face cleansing, take an appropriate amount of lotion onto your palm, and apply to your face.
 

Gently expand the lotion to your entire face as if you are blending it into your skin.

data.name: CURE Natural Aqua Gel (Exfoliator) 100g
data.description:
Features


 

  • Cure Natural Aqua Gel is a gentle and natural exfoliating gel that removes dead skin effectively without causing undue stress to the skin.
  • Very gentle and removes only unwanted dead skin.
  • Neither dries or thins your skin, preventing irritation and vulnerability to sun damage.
  • Contains 90% revitalized hydrogen water and natural plant extracts from aloe vera, gingko and rosemary.
  • Does not use preservatives, fragrance, artificial colorings or alcohol that can irritate skin.
  • Gently and effectively removes old and dead skin cells to promote skin renewal and prevent skin problems.
  • Complements any facial regimen to allow moisturizers, serum and other skincare formulas to penetrate deeper and better.


 

How to use :


 

  1. Simply apply a small amount on desired area after cleansing.
  2. Leave it for a few seconds to allow Cure Natural Aqua Gel to react to the skin cells.
  3. Avoiding the eye area, gently massage in a circular motion from 30 seconds to 1 minute.
  4. The gel will turn into a milky liquid and dead skin particles will be visible.
  5. Rinse well with water.


 

Ingredient:


Water , Glycerine Crosspolymer , Dicocodimonium chloride Stearicrimonium bromide Aloe vera leaf extract , Gingko leaf extract , Rosemary leaf extract Butylene glycol isopropanol

data.name: Rohto Acnes Smooth Base Tinted UV Milk SPF50+ PA++ 30g
data.short_description: Rohto Acnes Smooth Base UV Milk sunscreen emulsion with anti-acne properties. It can be used as a base for make-up. It is a sunscreen, anti-acne treatment, and makeup base in one. It strongly protects the skin against the harmful effects of UV rays, acts as a makeup base, and reduces and prevents the formation of acne.
data.description:
Rohto Mentholatum Acnes Smooth Base UV Milk SPF50+ PA++ is a sunscreen emulsion with anti-acne properties of the Japanese company Rohto. It can be used as a base for make-up. Rohto Mentholatum Acnes Smooth Base UV Milk SPF50+ PA++ is a sunscreen, anti-acne treatment and makeup base in one. This Japanese sunscreen strongly protects the skin from the harmful effects of UV rays, acts as a makeup base and reduces and prevents the formation of acne. It prepares the skin for the application of the foundation , controls the secretion of sebum, minimizes the appearance of imperfections, smoothes and provides skin comfort. It kills the bacteria that cause acne and has an anti-inflammatory effect. Light beige shade conceals pimples and traces of acne. The formula enriched with vitamins C and E leaves the skin soft and moisturised. The product is fragrance-free, non-comedogenic (does not cause blackheads, does not clog pores). Allergologically tested. Capacity 30g. 



  • Ultraviolet rays are one of the causes of acne exacerbation.
  • With SPF 50+ and PA++, it protects the skin from strong UV rays.
  • Contains isopropylmethylphenol, a bactericidal ingredient, and stearyl glycyrrhetinate, an anti-inflammatory ingredient, to prevent acne.
  • Contains vitamin C derivatives, which are moisturizing ingredients.
  • Colored type.
  • A beautiful finish that hides acne scars.
  • It can also be used as a makeup base.
  • Fragrance-free.





Active Ingredients:

UV Filter- Zinc oxide 


Tocopherol Acetate, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Isopropylmethylphenol Other Ingredients: Vitamin C tetrahexyldecanoic acid, aloe vera extract-2, octyl paramethoxysilicate, isononyl isononanoate, cyclopentasiloxane, methylphenylpolysiloxane, POE / dimethicone copolymer, dimethicone, trisiloxane, cyclotetrasiloxane , Tarku, yellow iron oxide, red iron oxide, black iron oxide, nylon powder, liquid paraffin, methylhydrogenpolysiloxane, Zn oxide, BG, ethanol, paraben
data.guide:
DIRECTIONS OF USE:

Apply on your skin and spread evenly.



Re-apply when you sweat or rub your skin.

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Gokujyun | Foaming Cleanser | Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Bubble | 160ml
data.short_description:
Light and soft foamy texture gently remove impurities, dirt, and oil. Contains Super Hyaluronic Acid that penetrates into skin to intensely hydrate, leaving skin soft and supple.

Skin pH balanced.
 

Low irritation.

Free of fragrances, mineral oil, alcohol, and colorant.

Suitable for all skin types.

Size: 160mL
data.description:
Hada Labo Gokujyun Moisture Bubble Foaming Cleanser preserves?your skin's natural moisture as you wash. Instantly foaming and easy to massage, this wash rinses clean without drying out your skin thanks to the "Super Hyaluronic Acid that can retain double the amount of moisture than the regular one hence better protect your skin against dryness. 

The cleanser comes with a special dispensing system that generates the ever so fluffy fine-bubbled foam that feels comforting on the skin. Use morning and night for a luxurious yet practical start to softer, more supple skin. 
 

INGREDIENTS:


 


Water, BG, isopentyldiol, lauryl glucoside, cocamide DEA, lauric acid, PEG-80 sorbitan laurate, sodium lauroyl methyl alanine, hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate (skin-adsorbing hyaluronic acid), sodium acetyl hyaluronate (super hyaluron) acid), sodium hyaluronate, isomerized sugar, pentylene glycol, polyquaternium-7, palmitic acid, myristic acid, potassium hydroxide, TEA, EDTA-2Na, BHT, sodium pyrosulfite, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
DIRECTIONS OF USE:

  1. Can be used alone or as a second cleanser in your double cleanse routine.
  2. Wet face with lukewarm water.




  3. Dispense 1 to 2 pumps of wash into hands.




  4. Gently massage onto face using circular motions to remove all makeup and impurities.




  5. Rinse thoroughly.





Use at night and in the morning or as needed.

data.name: OshimaTsubaki Camellia Hair Care Oil 40ml
data.short_description:
100% Camellia oil (Moisturizing, softening and protective agent)

■ Many Uses of Camellia Oil:

For hair: Protects hair against damage caused by the heat of blow dryers and exposure to ultraviolet rays (UVB). Provides moisture and luster while strengthening hair.

For Scalp: Brings about healthy scalp that is free of dandruff, itchiness, oiliness or dryness.

For Skin: Maintains moisture by suppressing the evaporation of moisture, protects skin from irritants.

■ Product Characteristics

OSHIMA TSUBAKI is a fragrance- and colorant-free all-natural, plant-based oil.

It is 100% natural camellia oil made only from camellia oil that meets OSHIMA TSUBAKI’s high standards.
data.description:
Category: Cosmetics/Hair care / Oil 
 

  • Brand Name: Oshimatsubaki
  • Company: OSHIMATSUBAKI Co., Ltd
  • Country of Origin: Japan
  • Quantity: 40 mL
  • Reference link: https://www.amazon.com/Oshimatsubaki-Camellia-Hair-Care-60ml/dp/B000OW9QCW


  
Indications and effects:

  • It contains an abundance of triolein, which is also a component of human sebum. This makes it gentle to the skin, blending naturally on hair and skin.
  • Original refinement technology removes scent and stickiness. As the oil is also not easily oxidized, it allows pleasant use to the very last drop.
  • Japanese men and women commonly use camellia oil to moisturize their skin, face and hair
  • Massage a few drops into damp clean hair ends to nourish dry hair, split ends, and dull strands
  • Generous 2 oz. bottle is an excellent value from Japan's leading maker of Tsubaki oil



Ingredient: 
 

  • 100% camellia japonica seed oil from japan is the natural way to restore moisture and sheen to hair with just a few drops. Product size: net volume: 60ml, or about 2.0 us fluid ounces.
data.guide:
How to use: 

For moisturizing and protecting hair: 


Take one drop of Oshima Tsubaki to add to clean, damp hair.

Even the oil out across your palm and fingers.

Run your fingers through your hair and lightly apply through the length of your hair.

Start with 1 drop and adjust once comfortable with the product.


To clean and soothe your scalp: 

Apply Oshima Tsubaki to your scalp before washing your hair with shampoo.

Using 1-2 tsp, gently press the oil on the the whole of your scalp with the pads of your fingers, without rubbing it in.

Let sit for 5 minutes, then rinse away thoroughly with warm water.

Wash hair and scalp as normal with shampoo.


To moisturize skin: 

Take 5-6 drops of Oshima Tsubaki onto your dry palm and apply to the face.

Let sit for 5 minutes, wipe the oil off with tissue then wash off with regular face wash.

Rohto Hada Labo Shirojyun Premium Medicated Whitening Lotion is formulated with Tranexamic Acid to help improve skin tone.

Prevents the formation of dark spots

data.description:
Hada Labo Shirojyun Premium Whitening Lotion Contains anti-inflammatory white tranexamic acid (whitening active ingredient) and nanosized hyaluronic acid, vitamin C derivative, and vitamin E as moisturizing ingredients. The toner pierces deep and repair UV-damage skin and prevent staining of skin cells. The lotion penetrates deep down, moisturizing and blocking the production of melanin, preventing the formation of wrinkles and freckles. It is suitable for sensitive skin as it is mild and gentle on the surface, color-free, and fragrance-free.

data.name: Skin Aqua Super Moisture Gel Pump (Spf50 + Pa ++++) 140g
data.short_description: Waterproof, sweat-resistant sunscreen comes in a fresh, gel-type formula that’s as light as water. Can be used on both the face and body, and is suitable as a makeup base. Full of gentle, moisturizing ingredients and formulated with light durability technology for strong UV protection.
data.description:
SKIN AQUA UV Super Moisture Gel is a moisturizing Japanese sunscreen gel that feels water-light for everyday wear. 

The sunscreen gel has the same highly moisturizing water-light texture as its previous formula, but it is renewed to feature maximum PA++++ UVA protection to better protect the skin against premature skin aging. It uses Rohto's patent-pending "UV Boost" micro-encapsulation technology that boosts UV protection by 3 times yet feels fresher and lighter on the skin. A blend of 3 types of hyaluronic acid keeps the skin hydrated. 

The water-light gel leaves the skin feeling hydrated, fresh with no residue. Best suited for daily use. 
 

  • For face and body
  • Resistant to water and sweat
  • Can be used as a makeup base
  • Removable with a face wash or soap


 


 

Major Ingredients:

UV filters: ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, bisethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyltriazine,  hexyl diethylaminohydroxybenzoylbenzoate, ethylhexyl triazone 

Other Ingredients -Water, ethanol, BG, isononyl isononanoate, sodium hyaluronate, hydrolyzed sodium hyaluronate (ultra-low molecular weight hyaluronic acid), hydroxypropyltrimonium hyaluronate (skin-adsorbing hyaluronic acid), silica, diethoxyethyl succinate, acrylates/C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, polyglyceryl-10 pentaisostearate, TEA, bisPEG- 18 methyl ether dimethylsilane, EDTA-2Na, xanthan gum, phenoxyethanol
data.guide:
How to use:

Apply an appropriate amount little by little, evenly to the skin.

data.name: Kao Biore UV Athlizm Skin Protect Essence Sunscreen SPF50+ PA++++ 70g
data.short_description: Water-based essence leaves a velvety sensation on skin with a light, floral scent, while providing powerful sun protection of SPF50+ PA ++++. Can be used on both face and body. Fitted with the Tough Boost technology for enhanced resistance against sebum and sweat.
data.description:
Biore UV Athlizm Skin Protect Essence incorporates Kao's new and unique technology "Tough Boost" to protect the skin under the most harsh environments. 

This Japanese sunscreen also features UV-blocking film function called "Outer Skin": it adheres to your skin well like a layer of skin that effectively covers all the areas you applied. 

Bior? UV Athlizm Sunscreen is particularly good at protecting the skin from UV under very hot and humid weather conditions. 

The essence type has a creamy base and fresh texture that spread smooth on your skin. 
 

Features


 

  • Suited for both face and body.
  • Super waterproof but washable with soap.
  • Strong resistance against perspiration and chafing.
  • Contains moisturizing ingredients hyaluronic acid, royal jelly extract, and BG.
  • Can be used as a makeup base.
  • Non-comedogenic tested.
  • Natural white floral scent.
  • The formulas have become more mask-friendly.
  • Highest rated UV protection in Japanese standard: SPF50+/PA++++
data.guide:
How to use:

  • Apply an appropriate amount little by little, evenly to the skin.



  • If the amount is small, it will not be possible to obtain a sufficient day saving effect.
  • Be careful not to stick liquid directly to clothes, wear clothes after dry.
  • In order to maintain the effect, frequently re-apply after wiping the sweat.
  • When removing, wash well with your usual cleansers (face is facial cleanser, makeup remover, etc, body is whole body washing fee, etc).
  • When it is difficult to fall down, carefully wash it twice.

data.name: Rohto HadaLabo Shirojyun Premium Deep Whitening Cream (Moisturiser)  50g
data.short_description:
Luxurious brightening cream penetrates deep into skin and suppresses melanin production to prevent freckles and spots from forming.

Formula treats sun damaged skin to leave it clear and radiant, without a sticky after-feel.

Slightly acidic formula is gentle on skin.

Free of fragrances, artificial colorants, mineral oils and alcohols.
data.description:
Hada Labo Shirojyun Premium Deep Whitening Cream is formulated with white tranexamic acid to treat dark spots, freckles, and other skin discolorations. 

Shirojyun Premium product series contains White Tranexamic Acid. This skincare component suppresses the generation of melanin, preventing the arise of mottled and freckled skin. It also has an anti-inflammatory effect to protect your skin from UV damage. 

This Japanese whitening cream for face also contains nano hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and Vitamin C to hydrate and protect your skin from dryness. 
 



 

Ingredient:

Key Ingredients-  

Tranexamic acid, glycyrrhizic acid 2K, Vitamin C derivatives , Vitamin E, 2 types of Hyaluronic Acid.


Other ingredients:

Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Na-2 Hyaluronate, Vitamin C Mg Phosphate, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, DPG, a Olefin Oligomer, Pentylene Glycol, Diglycerin, Tri(Caprylic-Capric) Glyceryl, Meadowfoam Oil, Dimethicone, lipophilic glyceryl stearate, POE(20) sorbitan isostearate, carboxyvinyl polymer, hydroxyethylcellulose, edetate, sodium pyrosulfite, stearyl alcohol

After washing face, apply on your skin.

data.name: Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioner Lotion 500ml
data.short_description: Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioner retains your moisture and conditions your skin with natural plant ingredient, hatomugi extract (moisturizing). Though moisturizing, it will not feel sticky and blends smoothly with dry, rough areas of the skin.
data.description:
Naturie?Skin Conditioner is a light and non-sticky moisturizing lotion featuring natural Job's tears (hatomugi) extract to deeply hydrate skin and keep it soft and smooth. 

Containing the maximum amount of water possible, it smoothly glides over the skin with a refreshing sensation, sinking deep into the skin as soon as you apply it. 

It also contains job's tears (hatomugi) and vitamin c, which have anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidative effects. 
 

FEATURES:


 

  • It replenishes the skin's moisture content and keeps the hydration inside, all without relying on heavy oils.
  • It does not leave your skin feeling greasy or coated in product, yet keeps the skin moisturized all day, making it perfect for a variety of uses.
  • Perfect for moisturizing skin all over the body and face.
  • Soothes redness after sunburn with a pleasant cooling sensation.
  • Holds moisture in after showering or bathing.
  • Suitable for both oily and dry skins.



Ingredients- Water, DPG, BG, glycerin, pearl barley extract, 2K glycyrrhizinate, (styrene/acrylates) copolymer, ethanol, citric acid, sodium citrate, methylparaben
data.guide:
DIRECTIONS OF USE:

After washing face or body, drop a generous amount onto your palm or facial cotton pad and apply to skin gently.
